citations.narrative:
Facility is currently exhibiting regulated animals at the Espresso Exotic Animal Expo in Dandridge, TN without a valid
USDA Animal Welfare Act license. The facility is exhibiting the following animal for photo shoots and public interaction: 2
juvenile ring-tailed lemurs.
A valid license is necessary to protect the health and well-being of the animals and to comply with the Animal Welfare Act
and Regulations. No person shall operate as a dealer, exhibitor, or operator of an auction sale, without a valid license.
The facility needs to obtain a USDA license if continuing to exhibit exotic/wild animal species.
Correct by discontinuing covered activity until a USDA license has been obtained.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.1(a)(1) 
   
Requirements and application. 
Facility is currently exhibiting regulated animals at the Espresso Exotic Animal Expo in Dandridge, TN without a valid 
USDA Animal Welfare Act license. The facility is exhibiting the following animal for photo shoots and public interaction: 2 
juvenile ring-tailed lemurs. 
 
A valid license is necessary to protect the health and well-being of the animals and to comply with the Animal Welfare Act 
and Regulations. No person shall operate as a dealer, exhibitor, or operator of an auction sale, without a valid license. 
 
The facility needs to obtain a USDA license if continuing to exhibit exotic/wild animal species. 
 
Correct by discontinuing covered activity until a USDA license has been obtained. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative. 
 
 n
